actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the uniform allowances available to Federal employees.

summary.text: Requires uniformed Federal employees to be provided with a uniform allowance of $300 and an annual uniform allowance of $200 in lieu of comparable benefits under any other provision of law. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5901; 5902)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the uniform allowances available to Federal employees.
